de_BE {
    Version{ "2.0" }


    NumberPatterns { 
        "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
        "#,##0.00 \u00A4;-#,##0.00 \u00A4",
        "#,##0%",
        "#E0",
    }
    Currencies {
        FRF { "FF",  "Franken" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimeElements:intvector{
                2,
                1,
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                "HH 'h' mm 'min' ss 's' z",
                "HH:mm:ss z",
                "HH:mm:ss",
                "HH:mm",
                "EEEE d MMMM yyyy",
                "d MMMM yyyy",
                "d-MMM-yy",
                "d/MM/yy",
                "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                        "Son",
                        "Mon",
                        "Die",
                        "Mit",
                        "Don",
                        "Fre",
                        "Sam",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                        "Jan",
                        "Feb",
                        "M\u00E4r",
                        "Apr",
                        "Mai",
                        "Jun",
                        "Jul",
                        "Aug",
                        "Sep",
                        "Okt",
                        "Nov",
                        "Dez",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
